name: Undead Alley
description:
Kill zombies to collect and upgrade your weapons. A, D, Space to move,

Click to attack

Click on items to pick them up

WEAPONSEFFECTSBaseball batHigh knockbackPipe wrenchMedium knockback, Medium damageCrowbarLow knockback, High damageFishLow knockback, Low damage, High stunATTACHMENTSGrip tapeMedium knockback, Medium stun increaseTrashcan lidHigh knockback increaseBarbed wireHigh damage increaseBatteryHigh stun increaseSpringHigh knockback increase
